data : {

“robotid”: ppepper的ID,

“project”: 项目名,

“concepts”: {

“XXX”: “YYY”

}

}
Returns:
{

“code”: 0, // 0 – sucess; none zero – failed.

“message”: “”,

“event_id”: “weather.query: date=今天&city=明天”,

“sid”: “xxxx”, // session id

“nlu”: {

“intent”: “”,

“slots”: {

“槽1”: “值1”,

“槽2”: “值2”

}

}, “debug”: {

}, “action”: {

post(handler, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

URL: /dm/robot/confirm/

Parameters:
data : {

“robotid”: ppepper的ID,

“project”: 项目名,

“sid”: “xxxx”,

“result”: {

“code”: 0, // 非0表示失败

“message”: “” // 错误消息

}

}
Returns:
{

“code”: 0,

“message”: “”

}
